90bc02a7-80b3-4434-819e-14f4baf17151.description: This badge validates that the recipient has the experience, skills and preparation necessary to deliver the Envision workshop for key Global Services customers. Global Services delivers this workshop in partnership with senior customer executives, and focuses on helping the customer to identify and articulate their business strategy. Earners of this badge have demonstrated the ability not only to facilitate the workshop, but also their ability in helping executives envision their future.
90bc02a7-80b3-4434-819e-14f4baf17151.name: Envision Workshop Facilitator

Leading minimum of one Envision Workshop

d3048fcd-47f4-4088-bcf0-5866ab0df1f1.description: This badge will help you conduct customer facing meetings in which you are able to uncover and qualify opportunities in talent and global services. This includes being able to articulate the customer's business challenge and metrics that matter.

8e0e2807-2f24-46c3-89bd-3c9a25f583dd.description: This badge will help you effectively prepare for your customer meetings. This includes choosing great discovery questions, understanding proof points, and identifying success stories of where we have solved similar problems in the past.
8e0e2807-2f24-46c3-89bd-3c9a25f583dd.name: Meeting Planning and Preparation

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of Running Customer Meetings Pathway

421a42bb-cd56-4a98-acaf-05da1139b179.description: Earners of this badge have completed Richardson's High-Stakes Consultative Dialogues training program. This is an advanced sales training solution that teaches a collection of dialogue models that apply an advanced consultative approach, skills, and techniques to help your team engage customers in higher-stakes dialogues. These dialogue skills are proven to advance alignment, drive momentum, and close complex sales deals.
421a42bb-cd56-4a98-acaf-05da1139b179.name: Navigating Executive Level Meetings
